text:
The XSLTProcess class manifests only xslp as deprecated, whereas the manual says
both xslp and xalan are.  I assume that the manual is correct and add a patch
that syncs the XSLTProcess class to it.
creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
ville.skytta@iki.fi
text:
Created attachment 4796
Bring XSLTProcess up to date with manual
